entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with ice pellets early this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow with ice pellets changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 7.
